name: Chess Game 2019
description:
Chess Game Free is the best free Chess game, best casual games on iOS with friendly user interface, smart AI, pretty visual effect.
Playing Chess game free, you can improve your chess skills.
All free to play, no in-app item, just for interesting and feeling.

5 Characters to play in Chess free:
- A Lucky Child: He is just 9 years old. This is the easiest level.
- Pretty Girl: She is beautiful, she is smart, she is 20 years old. This is medium level.
- Gentlemen: He is handsome, he is 39 years old, he is sober. This is hard level.
- Master: He is old, he is the master. You must have patience to play with him.
- Grand Master: He is very old, he is grand master. Challenge with him if you can.

Featuring:
- You can use unlimited undo.
- CPU thinking like a human.
- Show all the possible moves and impossible moves when selecting the chess.
- Very Brilliant User Interface, excellent graphic, magic animation.
- Auto saving game (Single player).
- Can play 1 vs 1 with your friends.
- Great moving effect.
- Pretty sound and music.
- Sign in and view leaderboard.

This game is supported for iPhone, iPad, iPod.

Nice time to play Chess game free, download the best Chess for iOS right now!
